properties.description: Numbering restart policies. Can return: NumberingRestartPolicy or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.description: Bullet character. Can return: Bullet or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: bulletChar

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.name: parent

properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: A collection of preferences objects.
properties.name: preferences

properties.description: Paragraph kashida width. 0 is none, 1 is short, 2 is medium, 3 is long. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: paragraphKashidaWidth

properties.description: The replacement ChangeTextPreference. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: changeTo

properties.description: The character style to search for or change to. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: CharacterStyle.
properties.name: appliedCharacterStyle

properties.description: The paragraph style to search for or change to. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: ParagraphStyle.
properties.name: appliedParagraphStyle

properties.description: The XML tag applied to the element. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: XMLTag.
properties.name: markupTag

properties.description: The amount to indent the first line. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: firstLineIndent

properties.description: The width of the left indent. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: leftIndent

properties.description: The width of the right indent. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: rightIndent

properties.description: The height of the paragraph space above. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: spaceBefore

properties.description: The height of the paragraph space below. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: spaceAfter

properties.description: If true or set to an enumeration value, balances ragged lines. Note: Not valid with a single-line text composer. Can return: Boolean, BalanceLinesStyle enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: balanceRaggedLines

properties.description: The paragraph alignment. Can return: Justification enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: justification

properties.description: The alignment to use for lines that contain a single word. Can return: SingleWordJustification enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: singleWordJustification

properties.description: The percent of the type size to use for auto leading. (Range: 0 to 500). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: autoLeading

properties.description: The number of lines to drop cap. Can return: Short Integer (0 - 25) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: dropCapLines

properties.description: The number of characters to drop cap. Can return: Short Integer (0 - 150) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: dropCapCharacters

properties.description: If true, keeps a specified number of lines together when the paragraph breaks across columns or text frames. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: keepLinesTogether

properties.description: If true, keeps all lines of the paragraph together. If false, allows paragraphs to break across pages or columns. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: keepAllLinesTogether

properties.description: The minimum number of lines to keep with the next paragraph. Can return: Short Integer (0 - 5) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: keepWithNext

properties.description: The minimum number of lines to keep together in a paragraph before allowing a page break. Can return: Short Integer (1 - 50) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: keepFirstLines

properties.description: The minimum number of lines to keep together in a paragraph after a page break. Can return: Short Integer (1 - 50) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: keepLastLines

properties.description: The location at which to start the paragraph. Can return: StartParagraph enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: startParagraph

properties.description: The text composer to use to compose the text. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: composer

properties.description: The amount to indent the last line in the paragraph. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: lastLineIndent

properties.description: If true, allows hyphenation in the last word in a paragraph. Note: Valid only when hyphenation is true. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: hyphenateLastWord

properties.description: Details about the drop cap based on the glyph outlines. 1 = left side bearing. 2 = descenders. 0x100,0x200,0x400 are used for Japanese frame grid. Can return: Long Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: dropcapDetail

properties.description: If true, allows the last word in a text column to be hyphenated. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: hyphenateAcrossColumns

properties.description: If true, forces the rule above the paragraph to remain in the frame bounds. Note: Valid only when rule above is true. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: keepRuleAboveInFrame

properties.description: If true, ignores optical edge alignment for the paragraph. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: ignoreEdgeAlignment

properties.description: The font applied to the ChangeTextPreference, specified as either a font object or the name of font family. Can return: Font, String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: appliedFont

properties.description: The name of the font style. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: fontStyle

properties.description: The text size. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: pointSize

properties.description: The leading applied to the text. Can return: Unit, Leading enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: leading

properties.description: The type of pair kerning. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: kerningMethod

properties.description: The amount by which to loosen or tighten a block of text, specified in thousands of an em. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: tracking

properties.description: The capitalization scheme. Can return: Capitalization enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: capitalization

properties.description: The text position relative to the baseline. Can return: Position enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: position

properties.name: underline

properties.description: If true, draws a strikethrough line through the text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: strikeThru

properties.description: If true, replaces specific character combinations (e.g., fl, fi) with ligature characters. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: ligatures

properties.description: If true, keeps the text on the same line. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: noBreak

properties.name: horizontalScale

properties.description: The vertical scaling applied to the ChangeTextPreference. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: skew

properties.name: fillTint

properties.name: strokeWeight

properties.description: The alignment to the frame grid or baseline grid. Can return: GridAlignment enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: gridAlignment

properties.description: The manual gyoudori setting. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: gridGyoudori

properties.description: The number of half-width characters at or below which the characters automatically run horizontally in vertical text. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: autoTcy

properties.description: If true, auto tcy includes Roman characters. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: autoTcyIncludeRoman

properties.description: The kinsoku set that determines legitimate line breaks. Can return: KinsokuTable, KinsokuSet enumerator, String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: kinsokuSet

properties.description: The type of kinsoku processing for preventing kinsoku characters from beginning or ending a line. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is defined. Can return: KinsokuType enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: kinsokuType

properties.description: The type of hanging punctuation to allow. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is in effect. Can return: KinsokuHangTypes enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: kinsokuHangType

properties.description: If true, adds the double period (..), ellipse (...), and double hyphen (--) to the selected kinsoku set. Note: Valid only when a kinsoku set is in effect. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: bunriKinshi

properties.description: The mojikumi table. For information, see mojikumi table defaults. Can return: MojikumiTable, String, MojikumiTableDefaults enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: mojikumi

properties.description: If true, disallows line breaks in numbers. If false, lines can break between digits in multi-digit numbers. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: rensuuji

properties.description: If true, rotates Roman characters in vertical text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: rotateSingleByteCharacters

properties.description: The point from which leading is measured from line to line. Can return: LeadingModel enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: leadingModel

properties.description: If true, ideographic spaces will not wrap to the next line like text characters. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: treatIdeographicSpaceAsSpace

properties.description: If true, words unassociated with a hyphenation dictionary can break to the next line on any character. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: allowArbitraryHyphenation

properties.description: The text after string expression for bullets. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: bulletsTextAfter

properties.description: The list to be part of. Can return: NumberingList, String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: appliedNumberingList

properties.description: The level of the paragraph. Can return: Long Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: numberingLevel

properties.description: Numbering format options. Can return: NumberingStyle enumerator, String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: numberingFormat

properties.description: Continue the numbering at this level. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: numberingContinue

properties.description: Determines starting number in a numbered list. Can return: Long Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: numberingStartAt

properties.description: If true, apply the numbering restart policy. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: numberingApplyRestartPolicy

properties.description: The character style to be used for the text after string. Can return: CharacterStyle, String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: bulletsCharacterStyle

properties.description: The character style to be used for the number string. Can return: CharacterStyle, String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: numberingCharacterStyle

properties.description: The number string expression for numbering. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: numberingExpression

properties.description: List type for bullets and numbering. Can return: ListType enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: bulletsAndNumberingListType

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ChangeTextPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
